block.p: MILLER-Julian, 80. Died January 25, 2001, after a lengthy illness. Beloved husband of Marion (Peters) for 59 years. Devoted father of Barry and Diane, Kenneth and Ronnie, Cathy (Catie) Miller of Hawthorne, FL, and Charles. Loving grandfather of Jill, Jeffrey, Jessica and Rebecca Miller. Devoted brother of Gloria Blick of Stamford, CT. Memorial services at Gutterman's, 175 North Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, at 2 PM, Monday, January 29. Shiva at 25 Hampshire Road, RVC, through Wednesday, January 31.
